archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: DEAD: MS: Basket
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Provide means to maintain and access basket information to internal and external consumers
Responsible to managing the creation of new baskets and the updating of existing baskets each product in the basket is represented by a SaleItem object, which holds the information about this transaction in the basket, including: productId (linking to the product in the Product Catalogue) quantity sold price vat rate
